answers.answer: Hi.Do you have back pains? What about neck pains?It is possible that your symptoms could be caused by nerve compression at the spine which could explain both upper and lower extremity symptoms.You should consult a physician to completely evaluate your symptoms for nerve impingement as well as rule out other causes such as vitamin and mineral deficiencies, diabetes, etc.Good luck.
Some back and neck pains but i believe they are due to lots of stress only hurts when under a lot of stress also i've just been really worried about als is that possible

Hi again.It would be very premature to consider amyotrophic lateral sclerosis as the primary differential diagnosis just based on your limited symptoms.However, if you are really concerned about this, it is advisable to ask a physician about it and do diagnostic tests to rule out such conditions.Hope this helps.

question: My arm started to feel a bit of a tingle around the forearm and hand (left) as if i would have slept on it the only thing is that i can still feel everything. The tingle has calm down a bit but now there is occassional pain down the arm and feels swollen but doesn't look to swollen i still have feeling what can this be i'm really worried i'm starting to get the same feeling on my left leg
title: arm and leg
